MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G53 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:58pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Crookston Castle School Substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:09 PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020
